body.p:
Head Quarters
3rd Regt Ky S. G.
Covington Ky.
July 30th 1861.
Sir
I have the honor to enclose the resignations of the following officers of the State Guard

Maj. S. K. Hays 1st Battalion
Capt. A. Madeira, Madeira Guard "
1st Lieut B. A Dulany "Buckner Guard" "
3 " W. B. Philips Madeira Guard " "
2d W. T. Estep " "
I recommend the aceptance of the above resignations
The election heretofore ordered for Colonel of this Regt; was fixed on Monday and but few of the companies voted.
I recommend that another Day be fixed for the election, makes sufficient votes were cast to have already determined the election.
Let sufficient time be given, and the election to fill all vacancies be fixed for the same Day.

Yours &c. H T Buckner
Lieut Col 3d Reg
From Col Buckner
